video.name: Baked Mediterranean Garlic Fries with Garlic Tahini Hummus Sauce - VeganRicha.com Recipe
video.description:
Baked potato wedges served with garlic hummus tahini oregano sauce. These
Full Recipe at- http://www.veganricha.com/2015/10/baked-fries-with-garlic-sauce.html

These Garlic Fries are super easy and very addictive. These are baked and vegan Mediterranean Garlic Fries. Add vegan feta if you like.

****************************************­*******

****************************************­*******

Music: Kero What am I supposed to Do.

recipeIngredient: 2  large russet potatoes cut into thin wedges or fat match sticks
2 to 3 tsp starch like arrowroot or flour
1/2 tsp or more dried oregano (or use fresh)
3 Tbsp hummus (or use cooked chickpeas + lemon juice)
1/4 tsp or more dried dill or parsley
2 to 3 Tbsp water as needed to thin
1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley or oregano for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Bake the fries: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F / 220ºc. Chop the potatoes. Press a paper towel on the potatoes to absorb excess moisture if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake the fries: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F / 220ºc. Chop the potatoes. Press a paper towel on the potatoes to absorb excess moisture if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add the chopped potatoes and toss in flour/starch. Then add oil and mix in. Sprinkle will salt, pepper, garlic, oregano and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add the chopped potatoes and toss in flour/starch. Then add oil and mix in. Sprinkle will salt, pepper, garlic, oregano and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the potatoes on parchment lined baking sheet with atleast a 1/4 inch between them. *Parchment papers have oven safe temperature mentioned on them. Do not use parchment with temp rating lower than 425. Bake on a greased baking sheet instead.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread the potatoes on parchment lined baking sheet with atleast a 1/4 inch between them. *Parchment papers have oven safe temperature mentioned on them. Do not use parchment with temp rating lower than 425. Bake on a greased baking sheet instead.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 15 minutes. Turn the sheet around and bake for another 5 to 10 minutes or until golden/golden brown on most edges. do not over bake to too much brown as the potatoes get bitter when burnt. .
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 15 minutes. Turn the sheet around and bake for another 5 to 10 minutes or until golden/golden brown on most edges. do not over bake to too much brown as the potatoes get bitter when burnt. .

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile make the garlic tahini hummus sauce: In a small skillet heat oil over medium-low heat. Add chopped garlic and cook until translucent. Stir occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile make the garlic tahini hummus sauce: In a small skillet heat oil over medium-low heat. Add chopped garlic and cook until translucent. Stir occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the rest of the sauce ingredients and half of the cooked garlic until smooth. Taste and adjust salt, tang (lemon juice) and garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the rest of the sauce ingredients and half of the cooked garlic until smooth. Taste and adjust salt, tang (lemon juice) and garlic.

recipeInstructions.text: To serve: Place a double layer of freshly baked fries in a serving container. Dress generously with garlic sauce. Sprinkle cooked garlic over the sauce. Garnish with chopped fresh oregano or parsley. Serve!
recipeInstructions.name: To serve: Place a double layer of freshly baked fries in a serving container. Dress generously with garlic sauce. Sprinkle cooked garlic over the sauce. Garnish with chopped fresh oregano or parsley. Serve!
